title: Triple Mushroom and Carrot Medley
directions: In a wok over high heat, heat the oil. Add the mushrooms and saute for 4 minutes. Add the carrots and saute for 3 minutes.
Add soy sauce, sherry, honey, and vegetable broth to the wok. Cover and steam for 2 minutes. Garnish with green onions.
ingredients: 1/2 cup low sodium, low fat vegetable broth
